title: Snervous Tyler Oakley
cast: Tyler Oakley
description: The inspiring Internet star and LGBT advocate shares an intimate view of his life and relationships during his international "Slumber Party" tour.

title: Untold: Caitlyn Jenner
description: Caitlyn Jenner's unlikely path to Olympic glory was inspirational. But her more challenging road to embracing her true self proved even more meaningful.

title: Untold: Deal With the Devil
description: Christy Martin broke boundaries and noses as she rose in the boxing world, but her public persona belied personal demons, abuse and a threat on her life.

title: Pray Away
description: Ex-leaders and a survivor of the so-called "conversion therapy" movement speak out about its harm to the LGBTQ+ community and its devastating persistence.

title: Fear Street Part 3: 1666

cast: Kiana Madeira, Olivia Scott Welch, Benjamin Flores Jr., Julia Rehwald, Fred Hechinger, Ashley Zukerman, Maya Hawke, Darrell Britt-Gibson, Jordana Spiro, Jordyn DiNatale
description: After a series of brutal slayings, a teen and her friends take on an evil force that's plagued their notorious town for centuries. Welcome to Shadyside.

description: After confessing an unusual secret, a repressed wife – prompted by her friends – decides to explore her sexuality with a high-priced call girl.

description: In this lesbian-themed nod to the film Run Lola Run, a photographer races against the clock to make it to an important meeting on time.

description: Neighbors but by no means friends, high schoolers Yolanda and Mari discover a bond and an attraction when they're made study partners.

description: Sweden's forward-thinking Queen Kristina resists her country's conservative ideals, which only grow more restrictive when she falls for a woman.

title: Hating Peter Tatchell

description: Rei helps the woman she’s been in love with for years escape her abusive husband. While on the run, their feelings for each other catch fire.

description: A court-appointed legal guardian defrauds her older clients and traps them under her care. But her latest mark comes with some unexpected baggage.

title: Monsoon
cast: Henry Golding, Parker Sawyers, Molly Harris, David Tran
description: A reflective man must come to terms with his forced displacement from Vietnam when he returns to his birthplace to spread his parents' ashes.

title: So My Grandma’s a Lesbian!

description: Singing and dreaming together, a talented singer-songwriter and a same-aged keyboardist add harmony and love to each other’s lives.

description: Tormented by bullies, an aspiring drag star working at an Alaskan cannery becomes a skilled fighter and is tapped for competition by a boxing coach.

description: In 1987, as martial law ends in Taiwan, Jia-han and Birdy fall in love amid family pressure, homophobia and social stigma.

country: Philippines, Canada, United Kingdom, United States

description: Three gay siblings are told by their terminally ill father that they must each produce a grandchild in order to inherit their share of his fortune.

description: The owner of a struggling carnival starts putting on small-time shows to save his wonderland as an old friend asks for help with a magical mission.

description: To cope with a friend's death, a teen blogs about his daily life but falls further into an existential crisis while experiencing a sexual awakening.

cast: Edward James Olmos, Zach De La Rocha

description: Decades after his play first put gay life center stage, Mart Crowley joins the cast and crew of the 2020 film to reflect on the story's enduring legacy.

description: An undocumented trans woman seeking legal status in the US becomes romantically involved with the grandson of the elderly woman she cares for.

title: John Was Trying to Contact Aliens

title: What Keeps You Alive
cast: Hannah Emily Anderson, Brittany Allen, Martha MacIsaac, Joey Klein, Charlotte Lindsay Marron
description: A couple's romantic anniversary retreat to a rural cabin unravels when a childhood friend appears and reveals long-held secrets from the past.

title: Mucho Mucho Amor: The Legend of Walter Mercado
cast: Walter Mercado
description: Dazzling and tender-hearted, legendary astrologer Walter Mercado vanished at the peak of his fame. This documentary poignantly explains what happened.

title: Disclosure
description: In this documentary, leading trans creatives and thinkers share heartfelt perspectives and analysis about Hollywood's impact on the trans community.

title: I Am Divine
description: This captivating documentary explores the life and work of filmmaker John Waters's muse: internationally celebrated drag superstar Divine.

description: When smart but cash-strapped teen Ellie Chu agrees to write a love letter for a jock, she doesn't expect to become his friend — or fall for his crush.

title: A Secret Love
description: Amid shifting times, two women kept their decades-long love a secret. But coming out later in life comes with its own set of challenges.

title: Circus of Books
description: For decades, a nice Jewish couple ran Circus of Books, a porn shop and epicenter for gay LA. Their director daughter documents their life and times.

title: Tootsies & The Fake
cast: Araya A. Hargate, Paopetch Charoensook, Thongkanthom Thongchai, Ratthanant Janyajirawong, Pattarasaya Kreuasuwansri, Gunn Svasti Na Ayudhya, Kritsanapoom Pibulsonggram, Keetapat Pongruea

listed_in: Horror Movies, LGBTQ Movies, Music & Musicals

title: All In My Family

description: After meeting by chance, two young musicians with differing views on love and life record an album that drastically alters their lives.

description: This documentary traces the life of "Tales of the City" author Armistead Maupin, from his conservative roots to his rise as an LGBTQ champion.

cast: Laerte Coutinho

description: A lesbian housewife, feeling trapped in a stale marriage, begins visiting female prostitutes and soon seeks excitement by becoming a sex worker.

description: An entrepreneur prone to partying and his estranged brother, a teacher resigned to a humdrum life, begin to bond under fragile circumstances.

cast: Katie Couric
description: Katie Couric explores our evolving understanding of gender identity, speaking with transgender and intersex individuals about their experiences.

description: A young woman's attempt to come out of the closet on Thanksgiving gets complicated when her male roommate shows up to her parents' home unannounced.

description: When a gay brainiac with OCD questions his identity, he enters a romantic relationship with a woman, leaving sex and physical intimacy out of it.

description: The lives and careers of two professional soccer players are profoundly impacted by a single moment of intimacy that took place between them.
